name: Robert Smith
title: Business Development/ Tech and E-commerce
review: KrispCall has been a great tool for my business. It’s become easy for our team to talk with each other and share contacts. We integrated our Slack account with KrispCall, so calling our clients has been easier.

name: Olivia Morris
title: Digital Marketing Director
review: Overall call quality was great. Also call recordings are of high quality.

name: Brad Monange
title: Product Designer
review: Switching to KrispCall was a smooth experience. The guys at KrispCall were very helpful. They migrated our VoIP system quickly and also ported our numbers. I was afraid number porting would be a hassle but they resolved it quickly by giving temporary numbers that matched our old numbers until official porting was completed.

name: Noah Williamson
title: Growth and Strategy Consultant
review: We have been getting quite a number of calls from the company website. Our sales team is happy getting to talk to potential clients who call from the website. Overall satisfied with the service.

name: Betty Preston
title: Business Development Manager
review: I have been using KrispCall for a few months and it’s so easy to manage contacts. I mostly use their mobile app to talk to clients. It’s like using any other chatting apps, very easy to navigate, call up contacts and look into contact history. KrispCall has been just great for handling client calls and passing calls down to my team.

name: Grace Gurrero
title: CEO / Upcorner
review: Cheaper than PSTN phones with a lot more flexibility. My business has greatly benefitted from KrispCall’s cloud phone.

name: Lily Meier
title: Sales and Marketing Executive
review: We recently purchased a bunch of KrispCall numbers for our marketing campaign. It was one of our best decisions. My team sent bulk SMS to our clients at so much lower prices than before. We also sent out SMS to our new locations in UK and the response was great. Definitely recommend getting international numbers from KrispCall.

name: Faizi Rahardian
title: Chief Operations Officer
review: Was a bit skeptical about upgrading to VoIP but the team at KrispCall was great. We got the Enterprise Plan and they got us all features we needed to shift our PSTN contacts to KrispCall. Pricing was reasonable, and faced very few problems that the team resolved quite fast.

name: Robert Jones
title: Account Executive
review: I liked that your contacts are updated in Salesforce automatically. Saved me a lot of time.

name: Amanda Wong
title: Independent Consultant
review: Good choice if you travel a lot. Could connect with my team easily from mobile phone. Also some features are great for if you share clients and contacts. You get to see what’s happening with your clients in the app and work together with your team to get clients onboard.

name: Conner Miles
title: Sales Director
review: Was working on a project with our marketing team and KrispCall made it super easy. Could create a new workspace and share and pin messages. Very handy and efficient.

name: Branda Turner
title: Senior Project Manager
review: Calls are easily connected, no glitches yet. Good support team. Happy with the service.

name: Jennifer Cooper
title: Digital Marketer
review: I liked that KrispCall offered MMS features. It was useful especially while reaching out to new clients. Also their app is very simple and clutter-free. Would recommend it if you are looking for features other than just standard calls.

name: Charlotte Taylor
title: Growth Marketing Manager
review: Kudos to the team for coming up with a great app. I use their desktop app a lot and it pretty well manages the call and SMS info itself.

name: Ross Zourgui
title: Business System Analyst
review: Great customer support. Keep it up!

name: Robert Scallion
title: Tech Consultant
review: KrispCall is great for talking to your team. All of us easily installed the apps in our cellphone and work laptop. Working from home was pretty much effortless with KrispCall and happily continuing with it now that I am back at the office.
